cyclone.name: FLORENCE
cyclone.current_location: about 575 miles SE of Cape Fear, North Carolina
cyclone.trajectory: continuing WNW, then turning NW and slowing as it approaches the North Carolina–South Carolina coast
cyclone.expected_landfall_location: coast between South Santee River, SC and Cape Fear, NC

weather_observation.watch_coast: Edisto Beach SC to South Santee River SC (Tropical Storm Watch) and Edisto Beach SC to South Santee River SC (Hurricane Watch)
weather_observation.warning_coast: South Santee River SC northward to Duck NC including Albemarle & Pamlico Sounds (Hurricane & Storm-Surge Warnings) and north of Duck NC to NC/VA border (Tropical Storm Warning)
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Carolina and Mid-Atlantic coasts, with outer swells extending southward to northeast Florida
weather_observation.wind: Low (≤18%) chance of sustained tropical-storm-force winds; occasional gusts possible in outer squalls
weather_observation.storm_surge: Long-period swells may push minor water rises, but guidance keeps surge below 3 ft at Jacksonville
weather_observation.rainfall: Light to brief moderate bands possible; totals generally <2 inches
weather_observation.other_hazards: High surf and dangerous rip currents; large swells affecting harbor approaches and offshore anchorage areas
